text: Ciguna musrikon metavonand nazdi Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras [ahdu] pajmone dosta ʙosand? Magar [dar mavridi] kasone, ki ʙo onon nazdiki Mascidu-l-harom [dar Hudajʙija] pajmon ʙastaed. Pas, to [musrikon dar mavridi on ahd] ʙo sumo pojdorand, sumo [niz] ʙo onon pojdor ʙosed, [caro ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo parhezgoronro dust medorad
